name: Simple Almond Cookie
description:
A tasty simple almond cookie,which can also be used as an Almondstone base 

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/4l67sw/recipe_simple_almond_cookie/
author: Demonic_Mixer

reviews.text: This is a very nice cookie.  A little dry, maybe, but there was no expectation of a moist cookie just from looking at the ingredients used.  I'm still gonna make a bigger bottle later.

Very nice almond cookie! As the name suggests, it is straight up a simple almond cookie. I like the way Sugar Cookie and Marzipan give it a dense yet fluffy body and the custard sort of smooths things out and bridges the flavors and textures. I can see why the Acetyl Pyrazine was used (brought in there to give it some texture), but I'm not a big fan of the flavor on acetyl pyrazine and typically use it a little lower, so that's why I knocked it a star (maybe some FA Cookie in it's place?). Other than that, this is an excellent recipe and good vape!
Simple almond cookie? Yes but than's why it tastes so good! Good enough to go back and mix 60ml after the first test batch.
